com.ramineqbal.personbackend.service

Class AddressService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ramineqbal.personbackend.service.AddressService

  • @Service
public class AddressService
extends Object
    AddressService class, annotated with Service (origin: org.springframework.stereotype.Service) Used as intermediary class between AddressRepository (Database-Interface) and AddressController (API-Controller) and essentially implements the functionality of the methods invoked by the API

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private AddressRepository addressRepository
      This is the repository interface to the AddressRepository used as a Data Access Layer to the Database; Will be dependency injected by Spring into this object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AddressService(AddressRepository addressRepo)
      Constructor which will instantiate AddressService with a dependency injected instance of AddressRepository

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Address addAddress(Address address)
      Adds an address to the database
      void deleteAddress(Long id)
      Deletes an Address from the Database based on the ID: Query: DELETE FROM ADDRESS WHERE id={id}
      Address findAddressById(Long id)
      Queries for an address, conditioning the result by the id
      List<Address> findAll()
      Queries for all addresses that are contained in the database
      Address updateAddress(Address address)
      Updates an adress in the Database based on all containing attributes/keys of the address object

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • addressRepository

        private final AddressRepository addressRepository
        This is the repository interface to the AddressRepository used as a Data Access Layer to the Database; Will be dependency injected by Spring into this object

    • Constructor Detail

      • AddressService

        @Autowired
public AddressService(AddressRepository addressRepo)
        Constructor which will instantiate AddressService with a dependency injected instance of AddressRepository
        Parameters:
        addressRepo - The AddressRepository that will be injected by Spring

    • Method Detail

      • addAddress

        public Address addAddress(Address address)
        Adds an address to the database
        Parameters:
        address - The Address to be added to the Database
        Returns:
        The input address that has been saved

      • findAll

        public List<Address> findAll()
        Queries for all addresses that are contained in the database
        Returns:
        A List of all Addresses parsed from the Database entries

      • updateAddress

        public Address updateAddress(Address address)
        Updates an adress in the Database based on all containing attributes/keys of the address object
        Parameters:
        address - An Address Object that will be compared to an existing address object in the database and overwritten
        Returns:
        The overwritten Address Object

      • findAddressById

        public Address findAddressById(Long id)
        Queries for an address, conditioning the result by the id
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the address that is queried
        Returns:
        The Address object that has been queried if it exists, else it returns an AddressNotFoundException

      • deleteAddress

        public void deleteAddress(Long id)
        Deletes an Address from the Database based on the ID: Query: DELETE FROM ADDRESS WHERE id={id}
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the address that is to be deleted
